Class SimpleRect

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicmotor.entities.Entity
      • graphicmotor.entities.SimpleRect

  • public class SimpleRect
extends Entity
    SimpleRect use basic GL methods to draw a rectangle using protected data in superclass Entity

    1.0
    Author:
    goozi

      • init

        public void init(GL2 gl)
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Provide a valid GLcontext for any entity which need it to finish them initialization.

        Some entity may need a valid GL context to achieve they initialization.

        Entity guarantee that this method will be called before any Entity.render(GL2, GLU, GLUT) method.

        Specified by:
        init in class Entity
        Parameters:
        gl - current GL context
